Nicola is an Air Traffic Controller. She has 4 sons, 3 of whom suffer complex medical issues that depend on her income. Despite receiving a paycheck that read $0.00 on Friday, she continues to report to work to keep the skies safe. #ShutdownStories

Sarah from Belleville is a single mom now facing a daycare bill she cannot afford. She has started working the midnight shift at Denny’s to pay for gas that takes her to a job she won’t receive a paycheck for. #ShutdownStories

Domestic violence shelters that depend on federal reimbursements are counting down the days until they will have to shut down operations. This shut down is a life or death situation for men, women, and children around the country. https://www.glamour.com/story/government-shutdown-domestic-violence-shelters …

Every bill that goes unpaid is a hit to federal workers’ credit scores & could adversely affect their security clearance, background checks, and future employment. Workers are scared to death what this shutdown means for them today and in the future. #ShutdownStories
FBI agents can’t conduct investigations or do their jobs. A shutdown puts their personal finances and our national security at risk. #ShutdownStories

Secret Service agents will take a bullet for their protectees. They have worked tirelessly without pay for the past 25 days and now are worried about how to pay their bills or if their credit rating will be hurt and impact their employment . #ShutdownStories

Constituents are crying as they look at days ahead. They're caught in a catch-22 as they work without a paycheck but must make money to buy gas or eat and need approval to work a second job. They shouldn’t need a second job. We must stop holding them hostage. #ShutdownStories
